products.name: Galileo Thermometer
products.description: Made of a sealed glass cylinder containing a clear liquid and several glass vessels of varying density, the individual floats rise or fall due to density changes as the temperature changes.

products.name: Beetle Bot
products.description: Robotic beetle that moves in response to touch and sound. Comes in various colors, for ages 5 and up.

products.name: Crookes Radiometer
products.description: Invented in 1873 by chemist Sir William Crookes, this device rotates faster when exposed to light, providing a quantitative measurement of electromagnetic radiation intensity.
